mapper.select: SELECT USER_ID, USER_PW, USER_NAME, USER_NICKNAME, USER_EMAIL, USER_GRADE, USER_POINT, USER_ADDR, USER_ADDR_D, USER_ZIPCODE, USER_STATE, USER_PHONE1, USER_PHONE2, USER_PHONE3 FROM USERS WHERE USER_ID = #{user_id} AND USER_PW = #{user_pw}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USERS (USER_ID, USER_PW, USER_NAME, USER_NICKNAME, USER_EMAIL, USER_PHONE1, USER_PHONE2, USER_PHONE3) VALUES(#{user_id},#{user_pw},#{user_name},#{user_nickname},#{user_email}, #{user_phone1}, #{user_phone2}, #{user_phone3})
